subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The PGA Tour and the Bridgestone Corporation said they had reached an agreement to extend Bridgestone’s title sponsorship of the W.G.C.-Bridgestone Invitational through 2014.
snippet: The PGA Tour and the Bridgestone Corporation said they had reached an agreement to extend Bridgestone’s title sponsorship of the W.G.C.-Bridgestone Invitational through 2014.
